com.precog.client.rest

Class Path

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.precog.client.rest.Path

  • public class Path
extends Object
    A simple path representation that conforms to the path syntax of the Precog service API.
    Author:
    Kris Nuttycombe , Tom Switzer

    • Constructor Detail

      • Path

        public Path(String path)
        Create a new path from the specified string. This path should consist of valid identifiers (alphanumeric strings) delimited by the "/" character.
        Parameters:
        path -

        Append that path to this one.
        Returns:
        the concatenation of the 2 paths

      • append

        public Path append(String that)
        Append that path to this one. This is equivalent to calling path.append(new Path(that)).
        Returns:
        the concatenation of the 2 paths

      • getPrefix

        public Path getPrefix()
        Return the prefix of this path. May return null if the path is only one element long.
